title: (report in progress) panic from `cargo check`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Apologies, this is a report in progress, because I'm rushing between tasks. I intend to fill out more detail later… Currently I've pasted the stack trace. ### Code ```Rust ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.62.1 (e092d0b6b 2022-07-16) binary: rustc commit-hash: e092d0b6b43f2de967af0887873151bb1c0b18d3 commit-date: 2022-07-16 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.62.1 LLVM version: 14.0.5 ``` ### Error output ``` Checking zcashd-config v0.1.0 (/home/nack/zc/zcashd-config) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: `(left == right)` left: `51807972367`, right: `1002111927320821928687967599834759150`', compiler/rustc_query_impl/src/on_disk_cache.rs:540:5 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f6d072f1fbd -
